summary: Realistic Water 2 plugin that changes the color of the water to blue.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This is tweaked water color of RW2. Depending on your ENB, it may result different.
Blue doesn't means fancy, you can either use a cinematic ENB preset and result good.
You can see how it results with a cinematic ENB by clickingÂ [url=http://i.imgur.com/nbYFF6F.jpg]this.[/url][/size]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][center][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This plugin does not change the color of every water. Places like Morthal and Blackreach are still the same.[/size][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Installation[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][center]You can automatically install Perfect Water with manager.
For my water settings, copy my [WATER] settings and replace them with yours which located in enbseries.ini.

Remember that ENB's water setting isn't the only thing that affects the color.[/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vye6zX5.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/c1MidtJ.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/i1vrDKn.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/vuOrEyw.jpg[/img][/size][/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font]
author: ProtologolusX
